mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_reply SET reply = #{reply}, replyer = #{replyer} WHERE rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(tbl_reply)*/ rno, reply, replyer, replydate, updatedate FROM tbl_reply WHERE bno = #{bno} AND rno > 0
